analysis.summary: The field 'agreement_date' is clearly a date field that requires capturing the date when an agreement was executed or signed by John Doe.
insights: Field name explicitly indicates this is a date type field
The 'agreement_date' terminology suggests a legal or contractual context
This is a standard document metadata field commonly required in contracts and legal agreements
The party association (John Doe) indicates this may be tracking when specific parties agreed to terms
recommendations: Validation: Require valid date format (MM/DD/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD), ensure date is not in the future if capturing historical agreements
Input format: Use a date picker component with format MM/DD/YYYY for consistency
Priority: HIGH - agreement dates are critical legal metadata that establish timelines and validity periods
